name: FrogKeeper
description:
FrogKeeper!

Help King Froggy to avoid the flies! Eat them when you can!

How long can you survive?

Controls:

Control the Frog with your Mouse Position. Avoid the Flies!

When prompted, use Right Click to suck the flies to you to eat them!

Full Credits:

  • Pixel River by Trevor Lentz (https://opengameart.org/content/pixel-river)

  • Happy Tune by syncopika (https://opengameart.org/content/happy-tune)
